练习1

```{r}
h <- 160:180
w <- 50:70
library(ggplot2)
df <- data.frame(h, w)
ggplot(data = df, aes(x = h, y=w)) + geom_point(color = "#ff2d51", size = 6)
```
练习2

```{r}
h <- 160:180
w <- 50:70
library(ggplot2)
df <- data.frame(h, w)
wdata <- data.frame(sex=factor(rep(c("F", "M"), each=200)), weight=c(rnorm(200, 55), rnorm(200, 58)))
a <- ggplot(wdata, aes(x=weight))
a + geom_area(stat = "bin", fill="#ff2d51")
                   
```
